queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `person` ( `id` int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(20), `lastName` varchar(20));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `producto` ( `id` int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(20), `desc` int, `precio` int DEFAULT 0, `stock` int DEFAULT 1);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usuario` (`id` int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, `user` varchar(25),`password` varchar(20));
